column8:
This t-shirt design admires Samuel Beckett. He is regarded as one of the most influential writers of the 20th century, winning the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1969.

Beckett's career as a writer can be roughly divided into 3 sections: his early works, up until the end of World War II in 1945; the second period, stretching from 1945 until the early 1960s, during which period he wrote his best-known works; and his late period, from the early 1960s until his death in 1989, during which his works tended to become shorter and his style more minimalist.
column21: This t-shirt design admires Samuel Beckett. He is regarded as one of the most influential writers of the 20th century, winning the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1969. Only right that he should have a t shirt designed in his honour then. from weadmire.net.
